meanings.definition: Occurring or done in an instant; immediate.
meanings.sent1: The magician's trick seemed instantaneously amazing to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The delivery service promised an instantaneously fast delivery for urgent packages.
meanings.sent3: The cat's instantaneously playful behavior made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room instantaneously, like a burst of sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sudden rainstorm flooded the streets instantaneously, catching everyone off guard.

meanings.definition: Happening or done without any delay.
meanings.sent1: The instantaneously decision to leave the party surprised his friends.
meanings.sent2: The email response came instantaneously, showing great efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The instantaneously arrival of the pizza made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: His apology was like an instantaneously soothing balm to her hurt feelings.
meanings.sent5: The news of the victory spread instantaneously through the crowd, causing celebrations.
